channel.title: FLF - Leadership Now Podcast
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: 132: What Happened on the Cross? [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
In this episode of Leadership Now with Dr. Aaron Rock, Aaron covers the atonement: What does it mean, the different theories of the atonement and how it affects our faith, and did Christ die for all people, or only the elect?

More Resources:

We are excited to partner with the Fight Laugh Feast Network to reach more listeners. Download the app here: https://subsplash.com/fightlaughfeastnetwork/app

More resources at Dr. Aaron Rock’s blog: Pursuit of Glory https://pursuitofglory.org/
item.author: Dr. Aaron Rock, Chris Eelman
item.itunes:author: Dr. Aaron Rock, Chris Eelman

item.title: 131: Is God Choosey? [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
In this episode, Dr. Aaron Rock talks the doctrine of election: What is it? Is it biblical? And how should it shape our view of God and salvation?

 

More Resources:

We are excited to partner with the Fight Laugh Feast Network to reach more listeners. Download the app here: https://subsplash.com/fightlaughfeastnetwork/app
